summary: Static single-page website/landing page for "Kedia Car Accessories" (Korba, Chhattisgarh) featuring a hero/intro, contact links (email + Instagram), Google Review CTA, embedded Google Map, and a work gallery.
architectural_notes: Site is a static HTML/CSS single page with responsive layout via viewport meta tag.
Uses external links (mailto, Instagram) and embeds Google Maps via iframe.
Gallery images currently use placeholders; intended to be replaced with real photos.
Store location map/link should reference https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA (ensure iframe/embed or a map CTA resolves to this location).

existing_features.title: Implement a responsive single-page landing UI for “Kedia Car Accessories | Korba CG” that mirrors the provided HTML content and sections: header, intro/services, contact CTAs (email + Instagram), customer reviews CTA (Google Review link), store location (Google Maps iframe embed), work gallery, and footer.

Apply a coherent automotive-inspired dark theme using Tailwind CSS that is consistent across all sections (e.g., near-black background, strong red primary accents, amber secondary accents), with clear typography hierarchy and accessible contrast.

Add the contact call-to-action buttons with the exact destinations: mailto:kediaacc@gmail.com and https://instagram.com/kediacaraccessories, styled as prominent buttons and opening external links in a new tab where applicable.
Add the “Customer Reviews” section with a prominent CTA button linking to the exact Google Review URL: https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA.
Embed the store location map using an iframe with the exact Google Maps embed source from the provided HTML and make it responsive (full width within a centered max-width container).

Replace the placeholder gallery images with bundled static images stored in frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in a responsive gallery grid (1 column on mobile, multiple columns on larger screens) with rounded corners.
Add a footer that includes the business name, the contact email (kediaacc@gmail.com), and the Instagram handle (@kediacaraccessories), using English text and consistent dark styling.

Update the “Visit Our Store” map section so the store location corresponds to https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA, including providing a visible link/button that opens this exact URL in a new tab from the map section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create responsive single-page landing site for Kedia Car Accessories with dark theme styling
Add contact CTAs: email (mailto) and Instagram link
Add Customer Reviews section with Google Review link CTA
Embed store location map using Google Maps iframe
Add work gallery section with images (currently placeholders)
Add footer with business name, contact email, and Instagram handle
Add/ensure Google Map for store location uses https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA
